Action adventure based on the 1960s TV series, starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander and Hugh Grant(n)

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: A Mob boss watches as his empire crumbles around him after he refuses to have his girlfriend's brother killed. A disgruntled henchman responds by heading up a breakaway criminal faction, while the boss's right-hand man tries to decide where his loyalties lie. The Coen brothers' Prohibition-era gangster thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, Marcia Gay Harden and John Turturro(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel(n)

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young hero's quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Edne's novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: A mysterious signal is transmitted to every mobile phone in the world, causing those who hear it to turn into bloodthirsty maniacs. A writer who was unaffected by the transmission bands together with a few other survivors to track down his family and unlock the mystery behind the crisis. Sci-fi thriller based on Stephen King's novel, starring John Cusack and Samuel L Jackson(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson(n)

programme.title: The Greasy Strangler
programme.desc: A tour guide competes with his son for the love of a woman as a murderer terrorises their neighbourhood. Comedy horror, starring Michael St Michaels and Sky Elobar(n)

Fantasy adventure based on Michael Edne's novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: An astronaut crash-lands on a strange planet and is captured and enslaved by the ruling race of highly intelligent apes. Luckily, he is helped by a sympathetic chimpanzee - but then discovers a shocking secret. Remake of the 1960s sci-fi adventure, directed by Tim Burton and starring Mark Wahlberg, Helena Bonham Carter and Tim Roth, and featuring a cameo appearance from the original film's star Charlton Heston(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster(n)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman(n)

programme.title: K-Shop
programme.desc: A Bournemouth takeaway owner despairs of his drunken, abusive customers and is finally pushed to the limit when his father is killed in a violent altercation. He begins murdering the people who make his life a misery, and disposes of the bodies by making them into kebabs. Horror, starring Reece Noi and Ewen MacIntosh(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly travels to the 21st century, where he has to save his children from a terrible fate. However, this proves to have unforeseen consequences when the future version of arch enemy Biff sees a chance to rewrite history for his own benefit, leaving Marty stuck in a twisted parallel universe. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn are instructed to protect Queen Amidala when her planet is invaded. Escorting her away from danger, they meet gifted youngster Anakin Skywalker, who seems ideally suited to join the pair's order - but is unaware of just how powerful he could become. Sci-fi prequel, starring Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman and Ray Park(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and apprentice Anakin Skywalker are sent to protect Senator Padme Amidala from an assassin. However, as galactic civil war threatens to erupt, the pair are forced to split their efforts, leading Anakin into an ill-advised romance and the beginnings of a journey toward the dark side. George Lucas's second prequel to the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman and Christopher Lee(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: Troubled Anakin Skywalker finds himself seduced by the dark side of the Force and is tempted into betraying his fellow Jedi Knights as conflict erupts across countless planets and the forces of evil prepare to seize control of the galaxy. The final instalment of the sci-fi prequel trilogy, with Hayden Christensen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Samuel L Jackson, Ian McDiarmid and Christopher Lee(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: Farm boy Luke Skywalker is thrust into an intergalactic battle between good and evil while trying to rescue a spirited princess from the clutches of the evil Darth Vader. En route, he is helped by a cocky space pilot, a veteran warrior, two bickering robots and a hairy 8ft alien. Sci-fi adventure directed by George Lucas, with Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness and Peter Cushing(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: The rebels are scattered across the galaxy after the Empire launches a devastating attack on their secret base. Luke Skywalker searches out a Jedi master to complete his training, while Han Solo and Princess Leia are relentlessly pursued by Darth Vader's space fleet. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams, Alec Guinness and David Prowse(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: The rebel heroes set out to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of alien gangster Jabba the Hutt before preparing for a decisive attack on the evil Empire. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker faces a more personal battle in a final confrontation with Darth Vader that leads him to the inner sanctum of the Emperor himself. Conclusion of the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford and Carrie Fisher(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: Farm boy Luke Skywalker is thrust into an intergalactic battle between good and evil while trying to rescue a spirited princess from the clutches of the evil Darth Vader. En route, he is helped by a cocky space pilot, a veteran warrior, two bickering robots and a hairy 8ft alien. Sci-fi adventure directed by George Lucas, with Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness and Peter Cushing(n)

programme.title: The Forgotten Kingdom
programme.desc: A young man reluctantly embarks on a journey to his ancestral land of Lesotho to bury his estranged father, and finds himself drawn to the mystical beauty and hardships of the people and the land he had forgotten. Drama, starring Zenzo Ngqobe, Nozipho Nkelemba and Lebohang Ntsane. In Southern Sotho(n)

programme.title: Road to Paloma
programme.desc: After avenging his mother's murder, a Native American flees across the desolate American West on his motorbike and attempts to scatter the late woman's ashes. Drama, directed by and starring Jason Momoa, with Sarah Shahi and Lisa Bonet(n)

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes(n)

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: An ageing gunfighter is drawn into the conflict between a land-grabbing cattle baron and a ranching family, but gets wounded in the process. A year later, he returns to town to find the situation has not improved - so along with his sidekick and the drunken town sheriff, he fights to defend the family from its enemies. Western, starring John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan and Ed Asner(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance(n)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Small-time crook Tony Montana emigrates from Cuba to the US, determined to become rich and powerful. Admitted into the inner circle of a Miami drug lord, he ultimately takes over his boss's empire and even his wife. However, his paranoia and cocaine addiction begin to spiral out of control, while his enemies circle, waiting for the chance to bring him down. Gangster thriller remake, with Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer and Robert Loggia(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Biopic of Notorious BIG, whose rise to fame took him from being a Brooklyn street hustler and crack dealer to become a respected and influential rap artist, before he was brutally murdered at the age of 24. Starring Jamal Woolard, Derek Luke, Dennis LA White and Angela Bassett(n)

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two maverick cops set out to topple a drugs baron who has transformed an apartment block into a seemingly impregnable fortress, but reckon without the villain's determination to stay out of jail - leading to explosive confrontations. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson, Chris Rock and Allen Payne(n)

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Outlaws hold staff and a passenger and her baby hostage at a remote stagecoach station while awaiting the arrival of a shipment of $100,000 in gold bullion. The nervous captives try to stay calm, but the tension between the gang leader and a jumpy henchman grows fraught, ending in a frantic shoot-out - with the infant in the thick of the fray. Western, starring Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward and Jack Elam(n)

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: A seven-year-old Jesus, still discovering the true extent of his gifts, is pursued by a Roman centurion. Biblical drama, starring Adam Greaves-Neal, Christian McKay and Sean Bean(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman officer and his assistant are charged with investigating what became of Jesus' body following the crucifixion, as the Roman hierarchy fears stories of a resurrected Messiah may lead to an uprising in Jerusalem. However, what they discover during their search forces them to question everything they believe. Biblical drama, starring Joseph Fiennes and Tom Felton(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Story Ever Told
programme.desc: The life of Jesus, from His lowly birth in Bethlehem and the miracles He performed, to His ultimate betrayal at the hands of disciple Judas Iscariot and His death by crucifixion. Biblical drama, starring Max von Sydow, David McCallum, Telly Savalas, Charlton Heston, Angela Lansbury and Sidney Poitier, plus several cameos including John Wayne(n)

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: A seven-year-old Jesus, still discovering the true extent of his gifts, is pursued by a Roman centurion. Biblical drama, starring Adam Greaves-Neal, Christian McKay and Sean Bean(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman officer and his assistant are charged with investigating what became of Jesus' body following the crucifixion, as the Roman hierarchy fears stories of a resurrected Messiah may lead to an uprising in Jerusalem. However, what they discover during their search forces them to question everything they believe. Biblical drama, starring Joseph Fiennes and Tom Felton(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: A cop infiltrates the inner circle of a feared Boston mobster, unaware a fellow officer is already an informant on the gangster's payroll. When both the crooks and the police discover they have a mole in their ranks, the two detectives realise they are in sudden danger and try to expose each other. Martin Scorsese's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg, Martin Sheen and Alec Baldwin(n)

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: Biopic of boxer Jake LaMotta, who rose to fame as the world middleweight champion in the 1940s. His career was marred by an inability to deal with his anger, leaving his family bearing the brunt of his rage and paranoia. Directed by Martin Scorsese and starring an Oscar-winning Robert De Niro alongside Joe Pesci and Cathy Moriarty(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving(n)

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: A low-born German fighter pilot's determination to win the flying corps' highest award rankles with his aristocratic comrades. Meanwhile, his clandestine affair with the wife of his commanding officer risks endangering lives and destroying his own reputation. First World War drama based on Jack D Hunter's novel, starring George Peppard, Ursula Andress, James Mason and Jeremy Kemp(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall(n)

programme.title: Kill Zone 2
programme.desc: An undercover cop is locked up in a brutal Thai prison, and must work together with a guard to survive. Action thriller sequel, starring Tony Jaa and Jing Wu. In Mandarin, Cantonese, Thai and English(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: A boy starts a new school determined to be popular and admired, only to find himself instead a target for bullies. He documents his experiences in a journal as he sets out on a series of attempts to gain the respect he feels he deserves - but his every effort ends in disaster. Family comedy, with Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron and Chloe Grace Moretz(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class Special
programme.desc: Director Matthew Vaughn and his cast discuss the making of the superhero prequel(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: An American couple decide their son needs a brother, and plan to adopt another child - but when they get to the orphanage they are greeted by a charming talking mouse named Stuart, who fits the bill perfectly. However, their jealous cat hatches a plot to get rid of the new arrival. Comedy adventure, starring Geena Davis and Hugh Laurie, with the voice of Michael J Fox(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class Special
programme.desc: Director Matthew Vaughn and his cast discuss the making of the superhero prequel(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence(n)

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Premiere. Tourists on a coach tour of the Netherlands find themselves stranded when their vehicle breaks down in the remote countryside beside an old windmill that appears neither on their itinerary nor any maps. With no mechanic willing to venture out until the next day, they have to stay overnight and begin to be picked off and dispatched with gruesome violence, realising that their dark secrets have resurrected a local blood-soaked medieval legend. Horror, starring Charlotte Beaumont and Noah Taylor(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice must battle her way through an entire city of the living dead in search of the scientist who created the zombie virus, in the hope of finding a way to stop it spreading further. Meanwhile, the corporation that employed him unleashes the product of its latest deadly genetic experiment on the city. Sci-fi horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich and Sienna Guillory(n)

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson(n)

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The teenage detective and his future sidekick Watson meet for the first time at boarding school. The death of Holmes's mentor sets the youngsters on their first case, and they discover that former members of an archaeological survey team have died under suspicious circumstances - pointing to a sinister Egyptian cult using hallucinogenic poisons to kill its victims. Adventure, starring Nicholas Rowe, Alan Cox and Sophie Ward(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: The plucky talking mouse feels left out when the son of his adopted human family makes a new pal - but quickly forgets such trifling matters when his high-flying canary friend is captured by an evil falcon, prompting the brave rodent to mount a daring rescue. Family adventure sequel, with Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie and Jonathan Lipnicki, and the voices of Michael J Fox, Melanie Griffith and James Woods(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt sent to find and destroy the only sample of a deadly man-made virus. However, he faces tough opposition in a former spy-turned-criminal mastermind who has already acquired the cure and now wants the pathogen itself. Director John Woo's action thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton and Anthony Hopkins(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy(n)

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Compilation of four stories of crime and betrayal set in a dangerous city. An honourable thug dishes out some vigilante justice, a private eye falls for the machinations of a femme fatale, a gambler gets in over his head, and a stripper plots revenge. Crime thriller sequel based on the comic-book series, starring Eva Green, Mickey Rourke, Jessica Alba and Josh Brolin(n)

programme.title: Brother
programme.desc: A Japanese gangster exiled to America forms an unholy alliance with his drug-dealing half brother, and the pair embark on a battle for LA's prime drug turf. Crime thriller, directed by and starring Takeshi Kitano, with Omar Epps and Claude Maki(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill(n)

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz(n)

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: Parrots Jewel and Blu lead a happy life together in Rio with their three chicks, until they find themselves hurled into an expedition up the Amazon. The journey leads to an encounter with an old enemy, while Blu also has to win the approval of Jewel's fearsome father. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway and Jamie Foxx(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: An earthquake forces a bear from the Peruvian jungle to start a new life in London. He finds modern Britain to be very different from the stories told to him by his aunt, but makes a new home with a kindly family. However, a sinister taxidermist intends to turn him into a museum exhibit. Comedy based on Michael Bond's series of children's books, starring Hugh Bonneville, Sally Hawkins and Nicole Kidman, with the voice of Ben Whishaw(n)

programme.title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
programme.desc: The mischievous schoolgirls embark on a hunt for buried treasure after learning their headmistress Miss Fritton is a descendant of pirates. However, they face competition in the form of a dastardly lord eager to locate the loot for himself. Comedy sequel, starring Rupert Everett, Gemma Arterton, Colin Firth, David Tennant and Talulah Riley(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A repairman is assigned to salvage the remaining resources from Earth, which has been left a devastated wasteland after a war with an alien race. He discovers a human survivor on the surface of the planet, an encounter that exposes secrets from the past that threaten the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure, starring Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin(n)

programme.title: Love Comes Softly
programme.desc: A widow enters into a temporary marriage of convenience, a practical arrangement to help a recently bereaved father care for his young daughter. However, when the time comes for her to leave, she realises circumstances and people have changed. Romantic drama set in 19th-century America, starring Katherine Heigl, Dale Midkiff, and Skye McCole Bartusiak(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Curtis is called up to serve in the medical corps in the Second World War as news reaches the town that a local man has been killed on the front line(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia responds to distressing news about the war by painting a local beauty spot so it will never be forgotten(n)

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem(n)

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud(n)

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles(n)

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A beautiful woman arouses the ardour of three rival suitors in 19th-century rural Dorset and, having flirted and toyed with their affections, she chooses to marry a caddish, gambling soldier - a decision that leads to a sequence of harrowing events. John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's classic novel, with Julie Christie, Alan Bates, Terence Stamp and Peter Finch(n)

programme.title: The Jazz Singer
programme.desc: A Jewish cantor's son goes against his strict father's wishes and travels to Los Angeles in search of fame and fortune. Remake of the 1927 musical drama, starring Neil Diamond in the role originally played by Al Jolson, with Laurence Olivier, Lucie Arnaz and Catlin Adams(n)

programme.title: Convoy
programme.desc: A renegade trucker clashes with a redneck sheriff and the authorities in general as he leads a mammoth convoy across America. Sam Pekinpah's road movie inspired by the song by CW McCall, starring Kris Kristofferson, Ali MacGraw, Ernest Borgnine, Burt Young and Madge Sinclair(n)

programme.title: That'll Be the Day
programme.desc: A school dropout leaves home and drifts through a succession of dead-end jobs until he finds an outlet for his frustration in rock 'n' roll. Drama, starring David Essex, Ringo Starr, Keith Moon, Billy Fury, Robert Lindsay and Rosemary Leach(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia's timid uncle Cody Nelson pays a visit to the family after losing his job in a bank, and John-Boy and Grandpa set out to find him a wife. However, he falls in love with Cordelia Hunnicutt, who has been married four times already, much to the disapproval of Olivia and Grandma(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy offers shelter to a gypsy couple with a sick child, but is shocked by the reaction of the rest of his family(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura makes a cruel joke at the expense of an overweight man, only to discover he is her friend's father(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls, Oleson and Garvey families get tired of the bustling city life and decide to return to Walnut Grove, where a shock awaits them(n)

programme.title: Hostile Advances: The Kerry Ellison Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman who is forced to take on the entire justice system to rid herself of an unbalanced workmate's unwanted attentions - and finds she needs all her reserves of strength to see the case through. Starring Rena Sofer, Victor Garber, Maria Ricossa and Karen Allen(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob befriends a boy who shares his love of flying, and they both fantasise about being pilots. However, reality brings them down to Earth with a bump(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Two English children come to stay with the Baldwin sisters after they are evacuated from London during the Blitz(n)

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A woman meets her fiance's parents for the first time just before Christmas, and is amazed to discover they are Santa Claus and his wife. While the experience restore her childhood love of Christmas, her cynical father is determined to stop her going through with the wedding. Comedy, with George Wendt, Shelley Long ad Kassia Warshawski(n)

programme.title: Moonlight & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A businesswoman returns home to help out her Dad's business Santaland after he suffers an injury. Despite her initial reluctance, she soon comes to appreciate the family trade. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Tom Arnold, Christopher Wiehl and Barbara Niven(n)

programme.title: Our First Christmas
programme.desc: A newlywed couple with children from previous marriages long to spend their first Christmas together as one big, happy family. However, the two different sets of siblings are set in their ways and refuse to surrender their customary yuletide traditions. Drama, starring Julie Warner, Steven Eckholdt, Katerina Graham, Dixie Carter and Carly Bondar(n)

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl wishes Santa would bring her a boyfriend for Christmas. Twenty years later, she is a lawyer recovering from a break-up and dreading Christmas with her parents. She receives an unexpected visit from a handsome stranger, who appears to be the answer to her teenage wish. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams, Shane Baumel, Charles Durning and Patrick Muldoon(n)

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario(n)

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Table
programme.desc: Family friends Sam and Kat grew up on together, spending every Christmas Eve at the children's table. They have shared the highs and lows of early adulthood, but as he grows older Sam begins to realise the affection may be more deeper than he had imagined. Drama, starring Danica McKellar, Dustin Milligan and Lea Thompson(n)

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott(n)

programme.title: Moonlight & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A businesswoman returns home to help out her Dad's business Santaland after he suffers an injury. Despite her initial reluctance, she soon comes to appreciate the family trade. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Tom Arnold, Christopher Wiehl and Barbara Niven(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The validity of the Waltons' claim to their land is questioned, so John-Boy takes a trip to the city to raise the $200 required for his family to register their right, while his younger siblings do their bit at home. Richard Thomas stars(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: When Verdie Grant learns her daughter is graduating from college, she feels embarrassed by the fact that she never learned to read or write. She asks John-Boy to teach her, on the condition that he keeps it a secret. Richard Thomas stars(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The residents of Walnut Grove work hard to restore the town to its former glory for founder Lars Hanson, who the Ingalls family discovers has been crippled by a stroke. Drama, starring Michael Landon, Karen Grassle and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert runs away from home, convinced Laura thinks he is trying to steal her father's affection(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: A newly qualified teacher sets up a makeshift classroom for homeless teenagers. Initially afraid and suspicious of her students, she gradually gets to know them and becomes determined to make a difference to their difficult lives. Fact-based drama, starring Emily VanCamp, Steve Talley and Treat Williams(n)

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Table
programme.desc: Family friends Sam and Kat grew up on together, spending every Christmas Eve at the children's table. They have shared the highs and lows of early adulthood, but as he grows older Sam begins to realise the affection may be more deeper than he had imagined. Drama, starring Danica McKellar, Dustin Milligan and Lea Thompson(n)

programme.title: Prison of Secrets
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a new convict in a women's prison, who struggles to expose a corrupt system under which guards demand sexual favours from her fellow inmates. Stephanie Zimbalist, Finola Hughes and Gary Frank star(n)

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd(n)

programme.title: A Question of Guilt
programme.desc: A divorcee's hedonistic lifestyle is greeted with disapproval, and the weight of public opinion swings against her when she is accused of murdering her children. Courtroom drama, starring Tuesday Weld and Ron Leibman(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered(n)

programme.title: Boss of Bosses
programme.desc: Biopic of Mafia boss Paul Castellano who rose rapidly through the ranks of organised crime to become the head of one of New York's biggest `families'. Renowned for meting out rough justice, he seemed to command the respect of cops and criminals alike - but despite his power, he was assassinated by a rival for his privileged position. Starring Chazz Palminteri, Angela Alvarado, Clancy Brown and Jay O Sanders(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: A safecracker comes dangerously close to getting caught red-handed, so decides the time has come to quit his life of crime. However, an old friend soon tempts him back with the chance to steal a priceless French artefact being stored in a customs house, and he joins forces with a talented young thief to carry out one last heist. Crime thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando and Angela Bassett(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: An unpopular restaurant critic is found murdered and ceremonially mutilated in his kitchen, and a petty thief linked to the scene of the crime becomes prime suspect. However, it soon transpires that the acerbic writer had a secret double life and bigger fish to fry - and that the killer's work is not yet over. Drama, guest starring Stella Gonet, Clare Hemphill and Struan Rodger(n)

programme.title: Love Comes Softly
programme.desc: A widow enters into a temporary marriage of convenience, a practical arrangement to help a recently bereaved father care for his young daughter. However, when the time comes for her to leave, she realises circumstances and people have changed. Romantic drama set in 19th-century America, starring Katherine Heigl, Dale Midkiff, and Skye McCole Bartusiak(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Curtis is called up to serve in the medical corps in the Second World War as news reaches the town that a local man has been killed on the front line(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia responds to distressing news about the war by painting a local beauty spot so it will never be forgotten(n)

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem(n)

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud(n)

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles(n)

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A beautiful woman arouses the ardour of three rival suitors in 19th-century rural Dorset and, having flirted and toyed with their affections, she chooses to marry a caddish, gambling soldier - a decision that leads to a sequence of harrowing events. John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's classic novel, with Julie Christie, Alan Bates, Terence Stamp and Peter Finch(n)

programme.title: The Jazz Singer
programme.desc: A Jewish cantor's son goes against his strict father's wishes and travels to Los Angeles in search of fame and fortune. Remake of the 1927 musical drama, starring Neil Diamond in the role originally played by Al Jolson, with Laurence Olivier, Lucie Arnaz and Catlin Adams(n)

programme.title: Convoy
programme.desc: A renegade trucker clashes with a redneck sheriff and the authorities in general as he leads a mammoth convoy across America. Sam Pekinpah's road movie inspired by the song by CW McCall, starring Kris Kristofferson, Ali MacGraw, Ernest Borgnine, Burt Young and Madge Sinclair(n)

programme.title: That'll Be the Day
programme.desc: A school dropout leaves home and drifts through a succession of dead-end jobs until he finds an outlet for his frustration in rock 'n' roll. Drama, starring David Essex, Ringo Starr, Keith Moon, Billy Fury, Robert Lindsay and Rosemary Leach(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia's timid uncle Cody Nelson pays a visit to the family after losing his job in a bank, and John-Boy and Grandpa set out to find him a wife. However, he falls in love with Cordelia Hunnicutt, who has been married four times already, much to the disapproval of Olivia and Grandma(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy offers shelter to a gypsy couple with a sick child, but is shocked by the reaction of the rest of his family(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura makes a cruel joke at the expense of an overweight man, only to discover he is her friend's father(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls, Oleson and Garvey families get tired of the bustling city life and decide to return to Walnut Grove, where a shock awaits them(n)

programme.title: Hostile Advances: The Kerry Ellison Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman who is forced to take on the entire justice system to rid herself of an unbalanced workmate's unwanted attentions - and finds she needs all her reserves of strength to see the case through. Starring Rena Sofer, Victor Garber, Maria Ricossa and Karen Allen(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob befriends a boy who shares his love of flying, and they both fantasise about being pilots. However, reality brings them down to Earth with a bump(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Two English children come to stay with the Baldwin sisters after they are evacuated from London during the Blitz(n)

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A woman meets her fiance's parents for the first time just before Christmas, and is amazed to discover they are Santa Claus and his wife. While the experience restore her childhood love of Christmas, her cynical father is determined to stop her going through with the wedding. Comedy, with George Wendt, Shelley Long ad Kassia Warshawski(n)

programme.title: Moonlight & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A businesswoman returns home to help out her Dad's business Santaland after he suffers an injury. Despite her initial reluctance, she soon comes to appreciate the family trade. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Tom Arnold, Christopher Wiehl and Barbara Niven(n)

programme.title: Our First Christmas
programme.desc: A newlywed couple with children from previous marriages long to spend their first Christmas together as one big, happy family. However, the two different sets of siblings are set in their ways and refuse to surrender their customary yuletide traditions. Drama, starring Julie Warner, Steven Eckholdt, Katerina Graham, Dixie Carter and Carly Bondar(n)

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl wishes Santa would bring her a boyfriend for Christmas. Twenty years later, she is a lawyer recovering from a break-up and dreading Christmas with her parents. She receives an unexpected visit from a handsome stranger, who appears to be the answer to her teenage wish. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams, Shane Baumel, Charles Durning and Patrick Muldoon(n)

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario(n)

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Table
programme.desc: Family friends Sam and Kat grew up on together, spending every Christmas Eve at the children's table. They have shared the highs and lows of early adulthood, but as he grows older Sam begins to realise the affection may be more deeper than he had imagined. Drama, starring Danica McKellar, Dustin Milligan and Lea Thompson(n)

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott(n)

programme.title: Moonlight & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A businesswoman returns home to help out her Dad's business Santaland after he suffers an injury. Despite her initial reluctance, she soon comes to appreciate the family trade. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Tom Arnold, Christopher Wiehl and Barbara Niven(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The validity of the Waltons' claim to their land is questioned, so John-Boy takes a trip to the city to raise the $200 required for his family to register their right, while his younger siblings do their bit at home. Richard Thomas stars(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: When Verdie Grant learns her daughter is graduating from college, she feels embarrassed by the fact that she never learned to read or write. She asks John-Boy to teach her, on the condition that he keeps it a secret. Richard Thomas stars(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The residents of Walnut Grove work hard to restore the town to its former glory for founder Lars Hanson, who the Ingalls family discovers has been crippled by a stroke. Drama, starring Michael Landon, Karen Grassle and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert runs away from home, convinced Laura thinks he is trying to steal her father's affection(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: A newly qualified teacher sets up a makeshift classroom for homeless teenagers. Initially afraid and suspicious of her students, she gradually gets to know them and becomes determined to make a difference to their difficult lives. Fact-based drama, starring Emily VanCamp, Steve Talley and Treat Williams(n)

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Table

Drama, starring Danica McKellar, Dustin Milligan and Lea Thompson(n)

programme.title: Prison of Secrets
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a new convict in a women's prison, who struggles to expose a corrupt system under which guards demand sexual favours from her fellow inmates. Stephanie Zimbalist, Finola Hughes and Gary Frank star(n)

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd(n)

programme.title: A Question of Guilt
programme.desc: A divorcee's hedonistic lifestyle is greeted with disapproval, and the weight of public opinion swings against her when she is accused of murdering her children. Courtroom drama, starring Tuesday Weld and Ron Leibman(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered(n)

programme.title: Boss of Bosses
programme.desc: Biopic of Mafia boss Paul Castellano who rose rapidly through the ranks of organised crime to become the head of one of New York's biggest `families'. Renowned for meting out rough justice, he seemed to command the respect of cops and criminals alike - but despite his power, he was assassinated by a rival for his privileged position. Starring Chazz Palminteri, Angela Alvarado, Clancy Brown and Jay O Sanders(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: A safecracker comes dangerously close to getting caught red-handed, so decides the time has come to quit his life of crime. programme.title: The Kingmaker
programme.desc: Axe investigates who was behind the breakdown in his Sandicot dealings but faces formidable opposition. Chuck digs up dirt on a political rival. Lara makes a PR trip to Sandicot to ease tensions between the town and the Axelrods. Wendy helps Taylor solve a problem at Axe Capital. Chuck and Senior curry favor with a powerful ally(n)

programme.desc: Pieces fall into place. Season finale(n)

programme.title: My Justice
programme.desc: Online, any of us can become judge, jury and executioner. But in this ever-shifting digital world, how do we draw the line between the rule of law, and a digital lynch mob? Elsewhere, a digital activist takes a stand for social justice then finds himself forced to choose between prison and exile(n)

programme.title: Ordinary People

Co-starring Timothy Hutton as the younger son, struggling against suicide and guilt and Judd Hirsch as the psychiatrist who provides his lifeline to survival(n)

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds

Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.title: Furry Vengeance

Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy(n)

programme.title: Congo

Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as the commander-in-chief of a country in chaos: a man with moral courage and a progressive thinker who challenged the status quo. Featuring an all-star cast including Sally Field, Tommy Lee Jones and James Spader(n)

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: Will (Landon Liboiron) is a young man harboring a secret crush on pretty classmate Eliana (Lindsey Shaw) and even bigger secret about his past: he's the son of a werewolf and may have supernatural gifts of his own. When a mysterious attack reveals that a werewolf army is being assembled by someone from his past, he's torn between his true nature and his love for Eliana. This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist III
programme.desc: Carole Anne is sent to live in a Chicago high-rise with her Uncle Bruce and his new wife, Pat. But that doesn't mean that she's escaped the apparitions that have haunted her in the past(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me
programme.desc: In a town where nothing is as it seems - and everyone has something to hide - this prequel to the television drama series chronicles the seven days leading up to the brutal murder of Laura Palmer in a small logging town in the Pacific Northwest. Written and directed by David Lynch and starring Kyle MacLachlan, Sheryl Lee, Heather Graham, David Bowie, Chris Isaak, Harry Dean Stanton, Kiefer Sutherland and more(n)

programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell(n)

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Mockumentary horror set in a 1960s paranormal research institute, where a new female subject displays demonic prowess. But when the US government steps in to weaponize her abilities, there are disastrous consequences(n)

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars in this eerie sci-fi drama about a gang of car thieves menaced by a mysterious black turbo racing car that seems literally hell-bent on avenging the death of a young teenager. Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Griffin O'Neal and Randy Quaid costar in this cult classic, a late-night television favorite(n)

programme.title: Refuge

When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have(n)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth(n)

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Robin Williams is a Cutter, a futuristic editor who shapes the digitally recorded memories of the dead into narratives that can be watched by their bereaved loved ones - but one new batch of memories contains horrible crimes committed by a wealthy and powerful client. Mira Sorvino and James Caviezel costar in this science fiction drama from writer/director Omar Naim(n)

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the Thirteenth
programme.desc: This wacky satire of teen horror spoofs every convention of its vapid genre with broadly funny style, following the efforts of a high school principal (Coolio) and a TV reporter (Tiffani Amber Thiessen) to uncover the truth about a series of slayings on campus. Tom Arnold, Shirley Jones and Jimmie Walker costar in this delightfully absurd lampoon(n)

programme.desc: Returning from duty in Afghanistan, a combat veteran (Michael Matthias) is dismayed to discover that his parents are dead and that his own brother has become a vampire king of the nosferatu. There's only thing for a red-blooded American hero to do: enlist the aid of a highly unusual priest (Michael Madsen) and go to war against his own sibling. Armand Assante costars in this fun, action-packed horror romp(n)

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust

programme.desc: Bill Pullman plays Fred Madison, a man who begins receiving disturbing video tapes of him and his wife (Patricia Arquette) sleeping. When the final tape shows Fred murdering his wife he is sent off to death row. Here Fred inexplicably becomes young Pete Dayton (Balthazar Getty), who leads a completely different life. Ultimately, the two identities begin to cross paths in this surreal, suspenseful web of intrigue from director David Lynch(n)

programme.title: Cry Freedom
programme.desc: Sweeping epic set in apartheid-era South Africa about white journalist Donald Woods (Kevin Kline), who is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death of black activist Stephen Biko (Denzel Washington)(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur(n)

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?

programme.title: Good Kill

But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n)

programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice(n)

programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else(n)

programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)(n)

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Joseph Fiennes and Jude Law star in this riveting account of the 1942-43 Battle of Stalingrad from the Russian point of view. Talented sharpshooter Vassili is a rural youth who becomes a national hero by almost single-handedly holding back the German assault. That is, until the Nazis send a gifted gunslinger of their own to the besieged city, his sole mission to assassinate Vassili(n)

credits.writer: Graphic Violence, Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Requiem For A Dream
programme.desc: Gritty, intense drama from director Darren Aronofsky ("Pi") that concerns the drug abuse of New York heroin users Harry (Jared Leto) and Tyrone (Marlon Wayans), as well as Harry's diet pill-addicted mother Sara (Oscar nominee Ellen Burstyn). As his world becomes increasingly focused on scoring, Harry drags his beautiful girlfriend Marion (Jennifer Connelly) down with him, leading to a harrowing finale. Chris McDonald, Louise Lasser and Keith David costar in this stylishly directed tragedy based on the novel by Hubert Selby Jr(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan(n)

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: The improbably true story of a charismatic conman's journey from small-town businessman to flamboyant white-collar criminal, who repeatedly finds himself on the lam, brilliantly escaping from prison on four separate occasions - all in the name of love. Starring Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor and Leslie Mann(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: Shields vs. Szabados (R)
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series returns, featuring two-time women's gold medalist Claressa Shields versus Szilvia Szabados. REPLAY(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Well-meaning retired cop Pally (Kiefer Sutherland) is only trying to help out his stepbrother Ray (Anthony LaPaglia) when he agrees to bankroll a long-shot racehorse. Lothaire Bluteau and Radha Mitchell costar in this superb crime drama from writer/director Mark Malone ("Dead of Winter," "Hoods")(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches(n)

programme.title: IVERSON
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary charting the rise of basketball great Allen Iverson, told largely in his own words. From a turbulent childhood of crushing poverty in Virginia to controversial run-ins with the law to iconic Philadelphia 76ers all star, his audacious rejection of convention and off the court embrace of hip-hop sent shockwaves through the NBA and influenced an entire generation(n)

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)

Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller(n)

programme.title: X-Rated 2: The Greatest Adult Stars of All Time
programme.desc: Documentary sequel that offers a close-up look into the personal lives of the legendary porn stars who've survived the test of time and influenced popular culture. Blends rare interviews with erotic clips and additional appearances by Whoopi Goldberg, Steven Soderbergh and a host of adult stars, directors and trendsetters(n)

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre(n)

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: Documentary from Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney that explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 that was allegedly commissioned by the US and Israeli governments to sabotage Iran's nuclear program that opened up a Pandora's box of cyber warfare(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: Larry has his life turned upside-down when he's saddled with a rookie partner and assigned to investigate an outbreak of mysterious food poisonings at the city's swankiest restaurants. Infuriating restaurateurs with his bad manners, Larry nevertheless manages to charm a sweet, shy waitress into a budding romance. But when unorthodox methods cost him his health inspector job, Larry has to go undercover to bring the conspirators to justice(n)

programme.title: American Heart
programme.desc: For most of us, the notion of living on the streets is little more than food for thought. But for a homeless father (Jeff Bridges) and his teenage son (Edward Furlong), it's a cold, hard fact of life. Director Martin Bell first explored life in the not-so-great outdoors with his 1984 documentary "Streetwise," an unforgettable look at the day-to-day tragedy of Seattle's street teens. With this eye-opening drama, he looks at this avoidable human catastrophe from a somewhat different perspective. Featuring music by Tom Waits(n)

programme.title: Dead Heat

programme.title: Double Whammy
programme.desc: Wry comedy from writer/director Tom DiCillo ("Living in Oblivion") stars Denis Leary as Ray, a widowed New York cop on disability leave since his botched handling of a fast food restaurant hold-up led to a bad back and bad PR. As Ray begins to shed his "loser" self-image with help from a pretty chiropractor (Elizabeth Hurley), some residents of his apartment building - including the vengeful, spoiled daughter of his super (Luis Guzman) and a pair of devious screenwriters - hatch dangerous schemes. Steve Buscemi and Donald Faison costar(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: In this adventure surf film a young woman, haunted by the memory of her deceased mother, leaves Malibu behind and heads to the breathtaking coast of South Africa on a quest to fulfill a surfing dream, with nothing but her mom's journal as a guide and a fun-loving group of surf fanatics cheering her on(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic(n)

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film(n)

programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer(n)

programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister(n)

programme.title: Rugrats In Paris: The Movie

programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. programme.title: The Hunt for the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Exploring the history and religious significance of the Israelites' Ark of the Covenant, a chest built at Moses' behest (and first mentioned in the Bible in Exodus 25:16). It is said to contain testimony of God's pact with the Jews and the tablets holding the Ten Commandments. Solomon placed the Ark in the Temple at Jerusalem (1 Kings 8:6-9), but it has been missing since the Babylonians destroyed the temple in 586 B.C. This hour includes speculation as to what might have happened to it. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are beside a river. They watch a fisherman make his rod longer and longer and longer. The fisherman casts out the line and then settles down for a nap. Chickedy and Chick run along the rod to the very end. Toodloo runs along the rod and jumps to join Chickedy and Chick. This causes the rod to spring up sending them flying! The fisherman wakes to discover a long, long, long fish at the end of his line. The Twirlywoo Screen draws a small line that Chickedy and Chick help make longer. Toodloo helps the line get a little longer still but when Great BigHoo taps the screen, the line becomes so long it shoots off the Twirlywoo Screen. The line gets longer and longer and goes into the Big Red Boat - right into Peekaboo's house! The Twirlywoos run after the Twirly Rings whilst Peekaboo reels in the long line(n)
